name: Party Pooper (Fabrício Guedes Faria, marifujino, Marcos Kenji Uchima, rtaue, marumun)
name_original: Party Pooper (Fabrício Guedes Faria, marifujino, Marcos Kenji Uchima, rtaue, marumun)
description:
It's a beautiful night in the realm. The Time Wizard was throwing an amazing birthday party and everyone was invited!

The music was great, the guests were having so much fun, but alas, when the time came to eat the cake, disaster struck!

When no one was looking, the Knight, a pesky little one, ate ALL THE CAKE. ALL. ALONE!

Infuriated, the Time Wizard cast a curse on The Knight!

"You shall have the worst dessert-related experience OF THEM ALL! In thirty seconds, the log shall be chopped, the brick shall be laid, the dookie shall be dropped, you shall lose control over your bowels! And it shall happen again, and AGAIN, FOR ALL ETERNITY!"

My my, what an astonishing turn of events! Will The Knight be able to alleviate themselves properly? Or will the halls of the Wizard's castle be stained by shame and sugary bits?

-------------------------------------------------------------

In this short roguelite experience, play as The Knight in a mad dash to find the little knight's room! Fight party-goers and the Time Wizard's minions, buy upgrades (where do they come from? who knows?) and experience potty problems over and over again.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Space - Dash
Mouse - Aim and attack

-------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made in 72h for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam, Jam category, with the theme "Stuck in a loop". If you participated as well, rate it at the Jam webpage!
